 (Center 2) Promotion for new active Prepaid Subscriber in November Promotion time : From 9 th November, 2013 to 29 th November, 2013 Eligibility : Prepaid subscribers Location : Center 2 Branches : Ho Chi Minh City A. PROGRAM 1: 1. Eligibility: VND0 Starter Kit (including MobiCard , MobiZone , and MobiQ) activated and first loaded on 9 th , 10 th , 11 th , 18 th , 19 th , 20 th , 27 th , 28 th and 29 th November, 2013. Q-Kid, Q-student, Q-Teen, PFC, Q263 kits and other kits which are switched to Q-Kid, Q-student, Q-Teen, PFC, Q263 (either activated or inactivated) are NOT allowed to join this program. 2. Content: First load promotion (before 31 st January,2014 ): bonus 100% scratch card value (50% on KM2 and 50% on KM3 credit) Following 5 loads promotion (2 nd to 6 th top up): bonus 50% value (25% on KM2 and 25% on KM3 credit) Eligibility: Loaded before 28 th February, 2014 Periodically promotion : added VND30.000đ/30 days for 12 times. Eligibility: Subscribers must have active 2-way communication. First addition: Added to KM1 credit Added on the day after activation. Next Additions: (no reservation). Added to KM2 credit. 2 nd addition: the balance in KM1 credit must be lower than VND10.000 in the previous month. 3 rd - 12 th additions: subscriber must load at least VND10.000 in the previous month. In case subscriber is under another promotion that gives monthly bonus on DK2 credit, the remaining amount on this credit will be lost after receiving bonus from this promotion. Notice: VND0 starter kits MobiQ will be added 60 days of use after activation. B. PROGRAM 2: 1. Eligibility: &#183; MobiCard, MobiZone, MobiQ starter kit : o Issued before 1 st January, 2013 without activation. o In store of MobiFone’s agencies and stores. The price excludes subscribing fee and SIM card cost (the price of the starter kits from the agencies and stores are as same as the listed price on the kit) o Main credit must have more than VND0 o Activated and first loaded on 9 th , 10 th , 11 th , 18 th , 19 th , 20 th , 27 th , 28 th and 29 th November,2013 . Q-Kid, Q-student, Q-Teen, PFC, Q263 kits and other kits which are switched to Q-Kid, Q-student, Q-Teen, PFC, Q263 (either activated or inactivated) are NOT allowed to join this program. 2. Content: &#183; Bonus 100% value of the remaining balance in the main credit (50% on KM2 credit, and 50% on KM3 credit). Following 5 loads promotion (2 nd to 6 th top up): bonus 50% value (25% on KM2 and 25% on KM3 credit) Eligibility: Loaded before 28 th February, 2014 &#183; Activated MobiCard and MobiZone kits but not loaded will have 15 days of use. C. PROGRAM 3: 1. Eligibility: M0 kits (including MobiCard , MobiZone , and MobiQ) which are activated and first loaded on 9 th , 10 th , 11 th , 18 th , 19 th , 20 th , 27 th , 28 th and 29 th November, 2013 . 2. Content: &#183; Receive the benefits of M0 kit policy &#183; Receive periodically promotion : added VND30.000/30 days for 12 months (no reservation) , regulations as listed in the Periodically Promotion (Program 1). &#65288; (2014 &#45380; 11 &#50900; 01 &#51068; &#51060;&#51204;&#50640; &#52649;&#51204;&#54644;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796; ): &#52649;&#51204;&#52852;&#46300;&#51032; &#50529;&#47732;&#44032;&#44201; 100% &#47484; &#54620;&#45796; . &#51221;&#44592; &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; : 3 0&#51068;&#47560;&#45796; &#54620; &#48264;&#50473; &#51221;&#44592; &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; &#44228;&#51221;&#50640;&#49436; 30.000 &#46041; &#52628;&#44032;&#46112; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796; (&#47784;&#46160; 12&#48264;) . &#51068;&#48152; &#51312;&#44148; : &#49688;&#49888;&#44284; &#48156;&#49888;&#51060; &#44032;&#45733;&#54644;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796;. &#52395;&#48264;&#51704;&#52628;&#44032; : &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; 1 &#44228;&#51221;&#50640;&#49436; &#52628;&#44032;&#46108;&#45796; . &#44060;&#53685; &#54980;&#50640; &#45796;&#51020;&#45216;&#50640; &#52628;&#44032;&#46108;&#45796; . &#45796;&#51020; &#48264;&#50640; &#52628;&#44592;&#46112; &#46412; ( &#45796;&#51020; &#48372;&#47448;&#46104;&#51648; &#50506;&#45716;&#45796; ) &#51221;&#44592; &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; 2 &#44228;&#51221;&#50640;&#49436; &#52628;&#44032;&#46108;&#45796; . &#46168; &#48264;&#51704;&#52628;&#44032; : &#51648;&#45212; &#45804;&#50640; &#51092;&#50529;&#51008; &#52572;&#49548; 10.000 &#46041;&#51064;&#45796; . &#49464;&#48264;&#51704;&#52628;&#44032;&#48512;&#53552; &#48372;&#45320;&#49828;&#47484; &#48155;&#44592; &#50948;&#54644; &#51648;&#45212; &#45804;&#50640; &#52572;&#49548; 10.000 &#46041;&#51012; &#52649;&#51204;&#54644;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#45716; &#44592;&#53440; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50640; &#44032;&#51077;&#54644;&#49436; &#51221;&#44592; &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; &#44228;&#51221; 2 &#50640;&#49436; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#44256; &#51080;&#51004;&#47732; &#50948; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032; &#48372;&#45320;&#49828;&#47484; &#48155;&#44592; &#51204;&#50640; &#44228;&#51221; 2 &#51032; &#45224;&#50500; &#51080;&#45716; &#51092;&#50529;&#51008; &#49325;&#52404;&#46112; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796; . &#50976;&#51032; : MobiQ 0 &#46041;&#51064;&#44221;&#50864;&#50640; &#44060;&#53685;&#54620; &#54980;&#50640; &#49324;&#50857;&#44592;&#44036; 60 &#51068;&#51012; &#52628;&#44032;&#46108;&#45796; . B. &#51060;&#48292;&#53944; 2: 1. &#51201;&#50857;&#48276;&#50948; : MobiCard, MobiZone, MobiQ &#44032;&#51077; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; : 2013 &#45380; 01 &#50900; 01 &#51068;&#51204;&#50640; &#48156;&#54665;&#54616;&#44256; &#50500;&#51649; &#44060;&#53685;&#54616;&#51648; &#50506;&#45796; . &#44032;&#51077;&#47308; , &#50976;&#49900;&#47308; &#50808;&#50640; &#45824;&#47532;&#51216; / &#51648;&#51216;&#50640;&#49436; &#45224;&#50500;&#51080;&#45796; . ( &#51060;&#48292;&#53944; &#51473;&#50640; &#47784;&#48708;&#54256;&#51032; &#45824;&#47532;&#51216; / &#51648;&#51216;&#50640;&#49436; &#50948; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#47484; &#54032;&#47588;&#54624; &#44032;&#44201;&#51008; Kit &#50640;&#49436; &#44277;&#54364;&#46108; &#44032;&#44201;&#50640; &#46384;&#46972; &#54032;&#47588;&#46108;&#45796; ). &#51452;&#50836;&#44228;&#51221;&#51008; 0 &#46041;&#48372;&#45796; &#51089;&#45796; . 2013 &#45380; 11 &#50900; 9, 10, 11, 18, 19, 20, 27, 28, 29 &#51068;&#50640; &#44032;&#51077;&#54644;&#49436; &#52395;&#48264;&#51704; &#52649;&#51204;&#54620;&#45796; . Kid, Q-student, Q-Teen, PFC, Q263 &#46608;&#45716; Q-Kid, Q-student, Q-Teen, PFC, Q263 &#47196; &#48320;&#44221;&#54624; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#50640;&#44172; ( &#44060;&#53685;&#46108; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; &#48143; &#50500;&#51649; &#50504; &#44060;&#53685;&#46108; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#47484; &#54364;&#54632;&#54620;&#45796; ) &#51201;&#50857;&#51060; &#50504; &#46108;&#45796; 2. &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032; &#45236;&#50857;: &#51452;&#50836;&#44228;&#51221;&#51032; &#51092;&#50529;&#51032; 100% &#51452;&#44032;&#46108;&#45796; ( ( &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; 2 &#44228;&#51221;&#50640; 50%, &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; 3 &#44228;&#51221;&#50640; 50%) &#45796;&#51020;&#50640; 5 &#52649;&#51204;&#52852;&#46300; &#47484; &#52649;&#51204; &#49884; &#54812;&#53469; : &#52649;&#51204;&#49884; &#52649;&#51204;&#52852;&#46300;&#51032; &#50529;&#47732;&#44032;&#44201;&#51032; 50% &#47484; &#52628;&#44032;&#46108;&#45796; .( &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; 2 &#44228;&#51221;&#50640; 25%, &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; 3 &#44228;&#51221;&#50640; 25%) &#51312;&#44148; : 2014 &#45380; 2 &#50900; 28&#51068; &#51060;&#51204;&#50640; &#52649;&#51204;&#54644;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796; . MobiCard &#44284; MobiZone&#45716; &#44060;&#53685; &#54980;&#50640; &#52649;&#51204;&#54616;&#51648; &#50506;&#51004;&#47732; &#49324;&#50857;&#44592;&#44036;&#51008; 15&#51068;&#51064;&#45796;. C. &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;3: 1. &#51201;&#50857;&#48276;&#50948; : 2013&#45380;11&#50900; 9,10, 11, 18, 19, 20, 27, 28, 29 &#51068;&#50640; &#44032;&#51077;&#54624; MobiCard, MobiZone, MobiQ 0 &#46041;&#50836;&#44552;&#51228; 2. &#51060;&#48292;&#53944; &#45236;&#50857; : 0 &#46041; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#51032; &#54032;&#47588;&#51060;&#48292;&#53944; &#50640; &#46384;&#46972;&#49436; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#45716;&#45796; &#51221;&#44592; &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; : 12 &#44060;&#50900; &#45236;&#50640; &#47588;&#50900;&#50640; &#51221;&#44592; &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; 2 &#44228;&#51221;&#50640;&#49436; 30.000 &#46041; &#52628;&#44032;&#46112; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796; .( &#48372;&#47448;&#46104;&#51648; &#50506;&#45716;&#45796; ). &#51221;&#44592; &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; &#44508;&#51221;&#50640; &#52280;&#51312;&#54620;&#45796; . ( &#51060;&#48292;&#53944; 1) D. &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032; &#44592;&#44036;: 2013 &#45380; 11 &#50900; 09 &#51068;&#48512;&#53552; 2013 &#45380; 11 &#50900; 29 &#51068;&#44620;&#51648; &#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6036;&#6020;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6023;&#6070;&#6040;&#6075;&#6035; &#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034;&#6035;&#6085;&#6017;&#6082; 11 /2013 &#6035;&#6085; &#6040;&#6023;&#6098;&#6024;&#6040;&#6030;&#6098;&#6028;&#6043;&#6033;&#6072;2 &#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035; : &#6038;&#6072;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 09/11/2013 &#6026;&#6043;&#6091;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 29/11/2013 &#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6036;&#6030;&#6098;&#6026;&#6070;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6039;&#6081;&#6033;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6102; TP Hồ Chí Minh A. &#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6033;&#6072; 1&#6102; 1. &#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035; &#6047;&#6040;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6102; MobiQ)​ &#6026;&#6086;&#6030;&#6078;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6047;&#6090;&#6072;&#6040;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6033;&#6073;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6016;&#6070;&#6031;&#6016;&#6084;&#6047;&#6026;&#6086;&#6036;&#6076;&#6020;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6036;&#6030;&#6098;&#6026;&#6070;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 9, 10, 11, 18, 19, 20, 27, 28, 29/11/2013 &#6100; &#6036;&#6030;&#6098;&#6031;&#6070;&#6047;&#6090;&#6072;&#6040; Q-Kid, Q-student, Q-Teen, PFC, Q263 &#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6036;&#6030;&#6098;&#6026;&#6070;&#6047;&#6090;&#6072;&#6040;&#6037;&#6098;&#6047;&#6081;&#6020;&#6036;&#6098;&#6031;&#6076;&#6042;&#6040;&#6016; Q-Kid, Q-student, Q-Teen, PFC, Q263 ​ ( &#6042;&#6077;&#6040;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6040;&#6071;&#6035;&#6033;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;&#6026;&#6086;&#6030;&#6078;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6047;&#6090;&#6072;&#6040;​&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6026;&#6086;&#6030;&#6078;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6047;&#6090;&#6072;&#6040; 15 &#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083;&#6100; C . &#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6033;&#6072; 3&#6102; 1. &#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035; &#6047;&#6040;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6102; &#6047;&#6090;&#6072;&#6040; M0 (&#6042;&#6077;&#6040;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035; MobiCard , MobiZone , &#6035;&#6071;&#6020; MobiQ) &#6026;&#6086;&#6030;&#6078;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6047;&#6090;&#6072;&#6040;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6016;&#6070;&#6031;&#6016;&#6084;&#6047;&#6026;&#6086;&#6036;&#6076;&#6020;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6036;&#6030;&#6098;&#6026;&#6070;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 9, 10, 11, 18, 19, 20, 27, 28, 29/11/2013 &#6100; 2. &#6017;&#6098;&#6043;&#6073;&#6040;&#6047;&#6070;&#6042;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6102; &#183; &#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6033;&#6033;&#6077;&#6043; chính sách bán hàng bộ M0 &#183; &#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6033;&#6033;&#6077;&#6043; &#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6042;&#6070;&#6043;&#6091;&#6044;&#6018;&#6098;&#6018;&#6102; &#6036;&#6076;&#6016; 30.000đ/30 &#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020; 12 &#6017;&#6082; (&#6040;&#6071;&#6035;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6042;&#6016;&#6098;&#6047;&#6070;&#6042;&#6033;&#6075;&#6016;), &#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6016;&#6086;&#6030;&#6031;&#6091;&#6040;&#6078;&#6043;&#6035;&#6085;&#6021;&#6086;&#6030;&#6075;&#6021;
